title: Extraction, identification and mass production of arbuscular mycorrhizal fungi (AMF) from faba bean (Vicia faba L.) rhizosphere soils using maize (Zea mays L.) as a host plant
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17
